title: Frequently Asked Questions
description: Find answers to common questions about our platform

faqs.question: How do I get started?
faqs.answer: Getting started is easy! Simply sign up for an account, choose your plan, and follow our onboarding guide. You'll be up and running in minutes.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers for enterprise customers.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. There are no cancellation fees, and you'll continue to have access until the end of your billing period.

faqs.question: Do you offer customer support?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We provide 24/7 customer support via email, chat, and phone. Enterprise customers also get dedicated account managers.

faqs.question: Is my data secure?
faqs.answer: Yes, we take security seriously. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest, and we're SOC 2 compliant with regular security audits.

faqs.question: Can I integrate with other tools?
faqs.answer: Yes! We offer integrations with over 100+ popular tools including Slack, Zapier, Salesforce, and many more. Custom integrations are available for enterprise customers.
